traits.name: Brave
entries: Mr. Greystone has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

traits.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Mr. Greystone hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Mr. Greystone makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Club
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
